author: Mr P
content: Lovely little spot, quick service, easy business, straight up, pick your 3 curries dumped on a fluffy mountain of nice rice, then dress it however you want, coriander, onions, xtra green chillies, take your pick and gobble it down. Â£8 bosh. Canteen /school dinner vibe seating, very very good and very very nice come on ladies come on ladies 8 pound curry
